para.text: The authority to issue the Class A and Class B Bonds, excluding Refunding Bonds, shall expire on September 30, 2025, if no Class A Bonds have been issued; provided, that the expiration of the authority shall have no effect on any bonds issued prior to the expiration date or on the District's ability to issue Refunding Bonds on a future date.

The authority to issue the Class B Bonds shall expire on September 30, 2029, if no Class B Bonds have been issued; provided, that the expiration of the authority shall have no effect on any bonds issued prior to the expiration date or on the District's ability to issue Refunding Bonds on a future date.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-263: § 16 of D.C. Law 22-263 provided that the creation of this section by § 15 of D.C. Law 22-263 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
Applicability of D.C. Law 22-263: § 7165 of D.C. Law 23-16 repealed § 16 of D.C. Law 22-263. Therefore the creation of this section by D.C. Law 22-263 has been implemented.
